Ready to Explore? Hunt for Treasures in:
Ready to Explore? Hunt for Treasures in the 
 Real World.
Bạn đã sẵn sàng tham gia vào một cuộc ph: Are you ready to embark on an adventure full of excitement and mystery? Let's explore the fascinating world of Checkly - where you can become a skilled checker or a cunning detective!
Checkly không chỉ là một trò chơi - nó l: Checkly is not just a game - it's a challenging and stimulating experience, where you can challenge yourself and connect with friends. Our goal is to create a unique and engaging gaming product that provides a realistic experience and community engagement.
Trong Checkly, bạn có thể chọn trở thành: In Checkly, you can choose to become a checker, where you'll create unique challenges and hide them in mysterious locations on the real-world map. Or you can also become a savvy detective, following clues and hints to uncover challenges hidden by other players.
Giao diện chính của game là bản đồ thực:
The main interface of the game is the real-world map, where you can see the locations of challenges set by other checkers. You can select your target and physically move to the challenge location on the map, using GPS technology to interact in the world of Checkly.

Based on the clues and hints provided by the checker, you'll have to search for and complete the challenge within a certain time frame. When you complete a challenge, you'll receive well-deserved reward points.

With Checkly, creativity and daring have no limits. Get ready for an adventure full of challenges and excitement with Checkly!

Don't miss the chance to be part of the Checkly community - where you can challenge yourself and create memorable experiences with friends!
Tại Checkly, chúng tôi coi trọng sự riên: At Checkly, we take your privacy and the security of your personal information seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our app.
Chúng tôi có thể thu thập thông tin cá n: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and location data when you create an account or use our app's features.
\nBằng cách sử dụng ứng dụng Checkly, bạ: By using the Checkly app, you consent to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this Privacy Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy practices, please contact us at contact@checkly.vn.

Ứng dụng không có quyền truy cập vị trí: App does not have access to Camera
